taskbody.prereq: These steps assume that you already have created a module that is opened in the editor.

step.cmd: In the Properties view, complete the following steps.

substep.cmd: Set Domain entity to the dataset name containing all attributes (arguments) contributing to the search.

step.cmd: Drop the Filter Criteria widget into the module.
step.stepresult: A picture materializes the final search input UI.

step.cmd: Drop the Fragment containing search navigation (buttons, icons, or labels) into appropriate place. The typical place for such a fragment is under the Filter Criteria.
